newsitem.title: USA: Oak Tree says completes buy of clinic.
newsitem.headline: Oak Tree says completes buy of clinic.

text.p: Oak Tree Medical Systems Inc said Monday it completed its acquisition of World Trade Center Physiotherapy and Rehab Medicine Clinic for $400,000.
Oaktree announced plans to acquire the clinic on July 9.
The clinic reported revenues for 1996 of more than $1.2 million and earnings of more than $300,000.
Oaktree said it has identified several other sites in the New York City area and is in talks with three other clinics.
Oaktree operates facilities in Queens, the Bronx, and Upper Manhattan.
